item.title: 尽管关税威胁迫在眉睫，印度仍认为与美国的关系处于 "最佳 "状态
item.description: 印度最高外交官在评论中表示，印度与美国的关系基础稳固，新德里正寻求降低进口关税，以抵御唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁征收可能会破坏双边和全球贸易的对等关税。【原文：India’s top diplomat said relations with the US are on firm footing in comments that come as New Delhi looks to lower tariffs on imports to fend off President Donald Trump’s threatened reciprocal levies that could upend bilateral and global trade.】

item.title: 默克集团预计今年利润增长将在经济复苏中放缓
item.description: 随着生命科学业务的持续复苏以及人工智能的蓬勃发展提升了半导体部门的需求，默克公司预测今年的利润将缓慢增长。【原文：Merck KGaA forecast slow profit growth for this year as its life science business continues to recover and the boom in AI lifts demand at its semiconductor division.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，微软在 IPO 前减少对 CoreWeave 的投入
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，由于交付问题和错过最后期限，微软公司已经撤销了与云计算供应商CoreWeave的部分承诺。【原文：Microsoft Corp. has withdrawn from some of its commitments with cloud computing provider CoreWeave due to delivery issues and missed deadlines, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.description: 下一个颠覆全球人工智能产业的 DeepSeek 也可能来自中国。【原文：The next DeepSeek to disrupt the global artificial intelligence industry could also come from China.】

item.title: 印度央行行长誓言与金融科技公司展开磋商
item.description: 印度央行要求金融科技公司和数字支付公司确保负责任的创新和更好的合规性，同时承诺采取更具协商性的方法。【原文：India’s central bank asked fintech firms and digital payment companies to ensure responsible innovation and better compliance, even as it promised a more consultative approach.】

item.description:

item.title: 土耳其通胀放缓为第三次降息埋下伏笔
item.description: 土耳其央行准备在连续第三次会议上下调主要利率，以抓住 2 月份通胀数据好于预期的势头。【原文：Turkey’s central bank is preparing to cut its main interest rate for a third consecutive meeting, seizing momentum from better-than-anticipated February inflation data.】

item.title: 亚洲顶级软糖制造商寻求融资最多 1.31 亿美元
item.description: 亚洲最大的软糖生产商之一计划通过出售股票筹集多达 2.14 万亿印尼盾（1.31 亿美元）的资金，这将是印尼今年最大的一次股票出售。【原文：One of Asia’s top gummy candy makers plans to raise as much as 2.14 trillion rupiah ($131 million) in a share sale that would rank among Indonesia’s largest this year.】

item.title: 力拓斥资 18 亿美元扩建皮尔巴拉铁矿中心
item.description: 力拓集团将斥资 18 亿澳元扩建其位于西澳大利亚皮尔巴拉地区的布罗克曼铁矿石中心，力图在老矿山枯竭的情况下保持足够的炼钢材料生产水平。【原文：Rio Tinto Group will spend $1.8 billion to expand its Brockman iron ore hub in the Pilbara region of Western Australia, seeking to maintain adequate production levels of the steelmaking material as older mines are depleted.】

item.title: 中信银行对建筑商 Logan 提起 8,400 万美元诉讼
item.description: 据彭博新闻社看到的一份法庭文件显示，中信银行国际有限公司已就开发商洛根集团（Logan Group Co.【原文：China Citic Bank International Ltd. has filed a HK$652 million ($83.9 million) lawsuit against developer Logan Group Co. over a loan the builder defaulted on in 2023, according to a court document seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Seven & i Holdings Co.股价反弹。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. is planning a large-scale share buyback to boost its valuation, according to people familiar with the matter. The stock rallied.】

item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. has named Rob Chan as head of its equity capital markets syndication in Asia, the latest in a flurry of changes across the sector in recent weeks.】

item.title: 投资者评估中国需求前景，铁矿石走势平稳
item.description: 由于投资者评估了中国的需求前景，包括中国政府今年可能减少全国钢铁产量的计划，铁矿石在略高于1月中旬以来最低收盘价的位置企稳。【原文：Iron ore steadied just above its lowest close since mid-January as investors assessed the outlook for demand in China, including Beijing’s plans to potentially reduce nationwide steel output this year.】

item.title: Onsemi 披露价值 69 亿美元的 Allegro 收购要约
item.description: 安森美半导体公司周三首次公开其对Allegro Microsystems Inc.的追求，披露了包括债务在内的69亿美元主动出价。【原文：ON Semiconductor Corp. made its pursuit of Allegro Microsystems Inc. public for the first time on Wednesday by disclosing an unsolicited $6.9 billion bid that includes debt.】

item.title: 中国燃料减产可能削弱全球石油需求
item.description: 中国正在推动其炼油厂减少燃料产量，这使人们对这个最大进口国的需求产生了新的疑问，而世界钻井商正需要买家来购买他们增加到市场上的额外油桶。【原文：China’s pushing its oil refiners to reduce fuel output, raising new questions about demand in the largest importing nation just as the world’s drillers need buyers for the extra barrels they’re adding to the market.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴公布 DeepSeek 最新竞争者后股价大涨 7
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）发布了一个模型，声称其性能不亚于 DeepSeek，而所需数据量仅为 DeepSeek 的一小部分，之后阿里巴巴的股价创下了几周来的最大涨幅。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s stock surged the most in weeks after taking the wraps off a model that it claims performs as well as DeepSeek with just a fraction of the data required.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行资产公司称，受利率和避险押注影响，日元或将上涨 15
item.description: 法国巴黎银行资产管理公司称，在日本利率上升的背景下，日元可能会走强至 1 美元兑 130 日元左右。【原文：The yen may strengthen to around 130 per dollar on the back of rising Japanese interest rates, according to BNP Paribas Asset Management.】

item.title: 特朗普将于下周初会见科技界领袖
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普准备在下周与美国最大的几家科技公司的领导人会面，这些公司正面临着进口关税和更严格出口规则的前景，这可能会颠覆它们的业务。【原文：President Donald Trump is poised to meet next week with leaders of some of the country’s largest tech companies, which are facing the prospect of import tariffs and stricter export rules that could upend their businesses.】

item.title: 美韩演习反映朝鲜-俄罗斯威胁
item.description: 首尔发表声明称，即将举行的美韩军队联合演习将考虑到朝鲜与俄罗斯不断加深的军事关系，这凸显出随着全球紧张局势的加剧，人们对这一联盟的担忧与日俱增。【原文：Forthcoming joint drills by US and South Korean forces will factor in North Korea’s deepening military ties with Russia, according to a statement from Seoul, underscoring growing concerns about that alliance as tensions rise globally.】

item.title: 缓慢移动的气旋有可能淹没澳大利亚东海岸
item.description: 澳大利亚东南沿海的数百万居民正面临着长时间的强降雨，可能会引发山洪暴发，因为热带气旋正缓慢地向澳大利亚第三大城市移动。【原文：Millions of residents on Australia’s southeast coast are facing a prolonged period of heavy rainfall that threatens flash flooding, as a tropical cyclone slowly tracks toward the nation’s third-biggest city.】

item.title: Klarna 最快将于下周申请 10 亿美元以上的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Klarna Bank AB 正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集至少 10 亿美元，最快将于下周公开募股。【原文：Klarna Bank AB is seeking to raise at least $1 billion in a US initial public offering and is set to file publicly as soon as next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾基金管理公司力促加入债券回购市场
item.description: 菲律宾的基金经理们预计今年将被纳入债券回购协议市场，这一发展可能为在亚洲增长最快的经济体之一进行更多投资铺平道路。【原文：Fund managers in the Philippines expect to be included this year in the market for bond repurchase agreements, a development that could pave the way for more investments in one of Asia’s fastest-growing economies.】

item.title: 奥尔在新西兰央行的潜在继任者名单中包括霍克斯比和丝绸
item.description: 在阿德里安-奥尔（Adrian Orr）任期还剩三年时意外辞职后，新西兰需要在今年找到一位新的央行行长。【原文：New Zealand needs to find a new central bank governor this year after Adrian Orr unexpectedly quit with three years remaining in his term.】

item.title: 星展集团即将离任的首席执行官古普塔在 "又一个辉煌之年 "获得 1300 万美元收入
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司将首席执行官 Piyush Gupta 2024 年的薪酬总额提高了 56%，理由是该银行创纪录的利润、突出的财富业务和强大的技术。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. raised Chief Executive Officer Piyush Gupta’s total remuneration for 2024 by 56%, citing the bank’s record profits, standout wealth business and strengthened technology.】

item.title: 日本最大工会组织将公布薪酬要求的力度
item.description: 周四下午，日本最大的工会联合会将对年度薪资谈判的势头进行提前测温，因为央行和政府官员正在寻找有助于推动经济发展的可持续薪资增长迹象。【原文：Japan’s largest union federation will offer an early temperature check on momentum in annual pay negotiations Thursday afternoon, as central bank and government officials look for signs of sustainable wage gains that can help drive the economy.】

item.title: 日本 10 年期债券收益率创 2009 年 6 月以来新高
item.description: 日本 10 年期国债收益率达到 2009 年 6 月以来的最高点 1.5%，德国国债遭遇柏林墙倒塌后几个月以来最严重的抛售。【原文：Japan’s 10-year government bond yield reaches its highest since June 2009 at 1.5% as German bunds suffered their worst selloff since the months following the fall of the Berlin Wall.】

item.title: 澳大利亚任职时间最长的董事会董事成为监察机构的目标
item.description: 澳大利亚审慎监管机构已将长期任职的董事会董事纳入其视野，建议将他们的任期限制为 10 年。【原文：Australia’s prudential regulator has long-serving board directors in its sights with a proposal to limit their terms to 10 years.】

item.title: S&P 建议放宽加拿大股票指数会员资格规则
item.description: 道琼斯指数公司（S&P Dow Jones Indices）建议修改资格标准，让那些不在加拿大注册的公司继续成为 S&P/TSX 综合指数的一部分。【原文：S&P Dow Jones Indices is proposing changes to eligibility criteria that would let companies that aren’t domiciled in Canada remain part of the S&P/TSX Composite index.】
